frontmatter.title: Sun dress
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of Aurora drawn with Paper for iOS on an iPad.

markdownRemark.html:
Something a little different from the normal no face, square format composition. PaperFaces portrait commission for @bobbydharrell of his daughter Aurora.

First drawing I’ve completed since receiving yet another replacement Pogo Connect. Not sure if it’s the updated firmware or the extra solder inside, but I have to press extra hard to get a full range of value. Perhaps I should take a look at the Pogo iOS app to see if I can adjust the tip’s sensitivity…

Tools used:

  • Pogo Connect Bluetooth Smart Pen
  • Paper for iOS
